rows.label: tlk46320171_02_msg0001
rows.name:
With Fan-sama's passing,
there is much mourning
even among the refugees.

rows.label: tlk46320171_02_msg0002
rows.name:
She would often personally pay visits
to the refugee camp when the Pope
was too busy to attend to them.

rows.label: tlk46320171_02_msg0003
rows.name:
I just hope this tragedy does not fan
the flames of the anti-Blade protests.
Erm, no pun intended, of course...
